Class RaftNode.AppendEntrySendThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • RaftNode.AppendEntrySendThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    RaftNode
    public class RaftNode.AppendEntrySendThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Self-defined Thread for Send AppendEntry The leader will send HeartBeat and AppendLogs to all server/specific server Thus will need to construct multiple thread tasks

      The constrcutor for AppendEntrySendThread
      AppendEntrySendThread​(RaftNode.AppendEntrySendThread aeSendThread)
      for copy from a existing AppendEntrySendThread can be used to clone an identical thread for running, while adding the original one into the store list

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppendEntrySendThread

        public AppendEntrySendThread​(RaftNode.AppendEntrySendThread aeSendThread)
        for copy from a existing AppendEntrySendThread can be used to clone an identical thread for running, while adding the original one into the store list
        Parameters:
        aeSendThread - the AppendEntriesSendThread to be cloned

      • AppendEntrySendThread

        public AppendEntrySendThread​(int followerId,
                             int currentIndex,
                             int currentTerm,
                             RaftNode.AppendEntryReceiveOperator commitOperator,
                             java.util.List<LogEntry> NodeLog)
        The constrcutor for AppendEntrySendThread
        Parameters:
        followerId - the FOLLOWERS of this LEADER node in this term
        currentIndex - LEADER's current Index of logs
        currentTerm - LEADER's current Term
        commitOperator - the Reply-Receive-Operator for this thread, call if AppendEntry response success
        NodeLog - The current LogEntries List, need to make a copy, do not modify the original Log in State Machine
